author: Natalie S
title: Very sweet hotel a short walk to the lakes
text:
Very different from your big chain hotel, it's small and only have a few staff, but all were helpful and friendly. Food is also nice if you want a snack, we had the dumplings and burger. Area is very residential but short walk from bars and nightlife of lakes area. You are right in the heart of a local area which you get used to quickly. All toiletries were provided and bed although a bit hard was comfy. We had a standard room but was quite small, and on a inside wall so no window. Shadow puppet show was 100% worth watching. Close to many restaurants and MTR short walk too. Bit hard to find in taxi but should be OK or drop off a short walk as roads are narrow
